verbs.description: [ARG0: Kellyanne Conway 's husband] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: trolled] [ARG1: her boss] [ARGM-ADV: again] . [ARGM-TMP: This time] , [ARGM-MNR: through some retweets critical of Donald Trump 's promise to formally ask the Department of Justice to investigate itself and the Federal Bureau of Investigation over an informant] .

Kellyanne Conway 's husband just trolled her boss again . This time , through some retweets critical of [ARG0: Donald Trump 's] promise to [ARGM-MNR: formally] [V: ask] [ARG2: the Department of Justice] [ARG1: to investigate itself and the Federal Bureau of Investigation over an informant] .

Kellyanne Conway 's husband just trolled her boss again . This time , through some retweets critical of Donald Trump 's promise to formally ask [ARG0: the Department of Justice] to [V: investigate] [ARG1: itself] and the Federal Bureau of Investigation [ARG2: over an informant] .
